sentence.Network_en: Set your course for the Hoth system. General Veers, prepare you men.
sentence.Network_cn: 设定航线到赫斯星系维斯将军, 去准备你的人!

sentence.Network_en: The months following the Battle of Hoth were especially trying for the heroes of the Rebellion.
sentence.Network_cn: 对起义军的英雄们而言,霍斯战役后的几个月过得尤为艰难.

means.word_mean: 1. a blind god; misled by Loki he kills Balder by throwing a bough of mistletoe
